name: Concurrent HTTP/2 streams
note: Gateway limits concurrent HTTP/2 streams per connection.

name: DLP file size
value: 100 MB per file (ZIP content <= 200 MB, 10 nested levels)
note: DLP only scans files within documented size and compression limits.

name: lite instance type resources
note: Configure via the instance_type property.

name: standard-4 instance type resources
note: Largest predefined instance size available during beta.

name: Image architecture requirement
note: Container images must target linux/amd64 to deploy on Cloudflare.

name: Provisioning delay after first deploy
note: Containers may return errors immediately after first deployment until provisioning completes.

name: Maximum simultaneous Worker connections
note: Each Worker can open up to six concurrent D1 connections.

name: SQL statement length limit
note: Applies to each statement including those inside batches.

name: Maximum bound parameters per query
note: Parameterized statements cannot exceed 100 bound values.

name: Maximum SQL query duration
note: Matches Cloudflare API request timeout for batch operations.

name: Maximum table columns
note: Tables cannot define more than 100 columns each.

name: DNS analytics historical data (account)
note: Controls lookback for account-wide query data in DNS analytics.

name: DNS analytics time interval (zone)
value: Free 7 days; Pro/Business 31 days; Enterprise 62 days
note: Maximum time range for zone-level DNS analytics panels and GraphQL queries.

name: DNS record comment length (Free vs paid)
note: Maximum stored comment size varies by plan when annotating records.

name: Import API rate limit
note: Applies to DNS record import operations via the API.

name: Zone file import size
note: BIND-formatted imports must not exceed the documented size limit.

name: CPU per request
value: 30 seconds default, configurable to 5 minutes of active CPU
note: CPU time resets with each incoming request or message and can be increased via wrangler limits.

name: WebSocket message size
note: Applies to incoming WebSocket payloads handled by Durable Objects.

name: Key and value size limit
note: Applies to entries stored via key-value APIs within Durable Objects.

name: Maximum bound parameters per query
note: Parameterized SQL statements cannot exceed 100 bound values.

name: Maximum SQL statement length
note: Mirrors SQLite-backed Durable Object SQL limits.

name: Default egress routing
value: Uses nearest Cloudflare data center when no egress policy matches
scope: Traffic without explicit dedicated egress selection
note: Load balancing retains user selection when multiple data centers are equally close.

name: WARP shared egress IPs
value: Default egress IP addresses are shared across all WARP users without Enterprise entitlement
note: Cloudflare does not publish shared WARP egress ranges, so allowlists require dedicated IP purchases.

name: Transformation caching window
note: Images counts each transformation once in a rolling 30-day period before billing again.

name: Direct upload URL expiry
note: One-time upload URLs expire after 30 minutes unless extended to a six-hour maximum.

name: Stored image file size
note: Uploaded images kept in the Images storage bucket cannot exceed 10 MB.

name: Transformation input size
note: Remote transformation requests must stay under the size and area limits enforced by Images.

name: Variant count per image
note: Each image can define 100 variants describing target resizing or formatting behaviors.

name: Minimum cacheTtl
note: cacheTtl parameters shorter than 60 seconds are not permitted.

name: Value size ceiling
note: Individual values stored in KV cannot exceed 25 MiB.

name: Metadata size
note: Metadata attached to keys must remain within the documented limit.

name: Storage per account (Free)
note: Free plan accounts are capped at 1 GB of total KV storage.

name: Writes to the same key
note: Each key can be updated at most once per second across plans.

name: Health monitor probe volume
value: Three probes per selected region per interval
note: Choosing All Data Centers or many regions increases the number of probes sent to each endpoint.

name: Monitor host header precedence
value: Endpoint host header overrides monitor header when both are set
note: Cloudflare uses the endpoint host header if defined.

name: Query best practice window
note: Focused time windows reduce data scanned and avoid timeouts.

name: Customer Metadata Boundary
note: Log Explorer does not yet support metadata boundary controls.

name: Dataset availability
note: Logs before enabling a dataset are unavailable in Log Explorer.

name: Logpush delivery cadence
value: As fast as once per minute
note: Batches have no minimum size, delivering logs quickly to destinations.

name: Instant Logs availability
note: Instant Logs is unavailable on Free or Pro plans.

name: Instant Logs session limit
value: One active session per zone, 60-minute duration, five-minute idle timeout
note: Streams end automatically when limits are reached.

name: Logpull availability
note: Logpull does not operate when Customer Metadata Boundary is set to EU-only.

name: Availability status
note: Customers request access before using the product.

name: WebSocket request counting
value: One HTTP upgrade request per WebSocket connection
note: Cloudflare measures WebSocket bandwidth as data sent from Cloudflare to the client during the session.

name: IPv4 preference for origin connections
value: IPv4 origin selected when both IPv4 and IPv6 are configured
note: Cloudflare prefers IPv4 origin addresses when dual-stack records are proxied.

name: Build timeout
note: Git-integrated builds terminate after 20 minutes of execution.

name: Drag and drop limits
note: Dashboard uploads cap file count and size as documented.

name: Files per deployment (Direct Upload Wrangler)
note: Wrangler uploads support up to 20,000 assets with a 25 MiB per-file limit.

name: Function usage model
note: Functions requests count against Workers plan quotas.

name: Maximum number of buckets per account
Maximum rate of bucket management operations
Managed public bucket rate limit
note: Exceeding the r2.dev throttle returns 429 responses and reduced throughput.

name: Bucket versioning APIs
note: S3 versioning operations like PutBucketVersioning are unavailable in R2.

name: Concurrent writes per key
note: Higher rates trigger 429 responses similar to other object stores.

name: Default LIMIT when omitted
note: Queries without an explicit LIMIT default to returning 500 rows.

name: Aggregation support
note: COUNT, AVG, MAX, and similar functions are not implemented in R2 SQL.

name: JOIN availability
note: Queries must target a single table without joins or subqueries.

name: Ordering rules
value: ORDER BY restricted to partition keys
note: Sorting can only reference columns that are part of the table's partition key.

name: Pagination
note: LIMIT accepts a single integer without pagination parameters.

name: SQL feature support
value: Only SELECT, FROM, WHERE, ORDER BY, LIMIT
note: Other SQL clauses such as GROUP BY, UNION, and window functions are unavailable.

name: Regional availability
note: Secrets Store cannot be used on the Cloudflare China Network operated by JD Cloud.

name: Secret naming rules
note: Secret names cannot contain whitespace characters.

name: Secret value size
note: Each secret must be a string no larger than 1024 bytes.

name: Per-hostname minimum TLS requirement
note: Only customers with the add-on can set host-level minimum TLS versions.

name: Regex availability
value: Included on Business and Enterprise plans
note: Regex support is not available on Free or Pro custom rules.

name: CPU time per invocation
value: 30 seconds default, up to 5 minutes configurable
note: Free plan Workers default to 10 ms CPU, while paid plans can raise limits via configuration.

name: Memory per isolate
note: Runtime gracefully recycles isolates that exceed memory to maintain stability.

name: Request header size
note: Aggregate request header size limit applies regardless of plan.

name: Request URL length
note: Requests beyond 16 KB URLs are rejected before hitting the Worker.

name: Worker bundle size
note: Worker size limits govern uploaded script bundles per plan tier.

name: CPU time per step
value: 10 ms default (Free), 30 seconds configurable up to 5 minutes (Paid)
note: CPU configuration aligns with Workers limits for workflow execution.

name: step.sleep maximum duration
note: Sleep operations can pause workflows for up to one year without consuming compute.

name: Event payload size
note: Events passed to workflows must be 1 MiB or less.

name: Workflow script size
note: Script size inherits Worker bundle limits.

name: Workflow steps per instance
note: Instances terminate if they exceed the maximum number of steps.
